name: 🔮 ORB GAME 🔮
description:
🔮ORB GAME 🔮 is not your average platformer -- with the power of magic, you can cast orbs that are also platforms.

Originally made for Eggplant Podcast Community Game Jam #4 (Theme: "Making Magic")

Controls

ActionKeyAltRunA/DLeft/Right
JumpSpaceCast OrbJClear OrbsKRestart LevelRPauseEnterReturnMenu ScrollW/SUp/DownMenu SelectJReturn
